==In Gantt you can make a task parent of another task. There are two possible ways to do this: ==

===Editing the task:===

1. Select the task you want to do the child.

2. Click on edit button. A Edit Task overlay shows up.

3. Click on Parent icon, next to the parent field.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttParentTaskIcon.png" align="left" />

4. Select the task you want to be the parent.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttParentTaskOverlay.png" align="left" />

5. Click on Save button.
